fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: start-shopping-url
fields.label: Start Shopping URL
fields.description: Link to the start shopping page

fields.name: checkout-url
fields.label: Checkout URL
fields.description: Link to Checkout page

fields.name: hide-heading
fields.label: Hide Heading
fields.description: Hide the heading of the cart

fields.name: hide-attributes
fields.label: Hide Attributes
fields.description: Hide the attributes of the cart

fields.name: enable-item-quantity-update
fields.label: Enable Item Quantity Update
fields.description: Enable the ability to update the quantity of items in the cart

fields.name: enable-item-remove
fields.label: Enable Item Remove
fields.description: Enable the ability to remove items from the cart

fields.name: enable-estimate-shipping
fields.label: Enable Estimate Shipping
fields.description: Enable the ability to estimate shipping costs

fields.name: max-items
fields.label: Max Items
fields.description: Maximum number of items to display in the cart

fields.name: fileReference
fields.label: Image
fields.description: The reward image, min Xpx x Ypx...

fields.name: fileReferenceAlt
fields.label: Image Description
fields.description: A descriptive text of the image will be shown as tooltip.

fields.name: eyebrow
fields.label: Eyebrow
fields.description: Sets the small pre-title above the title.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Heading
fields.description: Sets the main title of the reward.

fields.name: longDescr
fields.label: Long Description
fields.description: The description shown in Desktop and Tablet view.

fields.name: shortDescr
fields.label: Short Description
fields.description: The description shown in Mobile view. If not set long text is used.

fields.name: cta1Type
fields.label: First CTA Type
fields.description: 'Primary' will render button filled, 'Secondary' with an outline.

fields.name: cta1Text
fields.label: First CTA Text
fields.description: Text to be shown inside button.

fields.name: cta1
fields.label: First CTA Link
fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.

fields.name: cta2Type
fields.label: Second CTA Type
fields.description: 'Primary' will render button filled, 'Secondary' with an outline.

fields.name: cta2Text
fields.label: Second CTA Text
fields.description: Text to be shown inside button.

fields.name: cta2
fields.label: Second CTA Link
fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.
